chart.name: chart.unpaid.invoices.per.customer
chart.title: Unpaid Invoices per customer
chart.dataset:
select count(*) as count, party.name as name
from gst_invoice as invoice left join gst_party as party on invoice.party=party.id where invoice.status in('draft','validated') AND DATE(invoice.created_on) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND party.customer
group by party.name

chart.name: chart.paid.invoices.per.category.per.product
chart.title: Paid Invoices per category per product
chart.dataset:
select count(invoice.id) as count, product.name as product_name, product_category.name as category_name
from gst_invoice as invoice left join gst_invoice_line as invoiceLine on invoice.id=invoiceLine.invoice left join gst_product as product on product.id=invoiceLine.product left join gst_product_category as product_category on product_category.id=product.category
where invoice.status='paid' AND DATE(invoice.created_on) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate)
group by category_name, product_name;

chart.name: chart.invoices.per.status.per.amount
chart.title: Invoices per Status:Amount
chart.dataset: select sum(gross_amount) as amount, status from gst_invoice group by status;

chart.name: chart.invoices.per.status.noOfInvoices
chart.title: Invoices per Status:No. of Invoices
chart.dataset: select count(*) as count, status from gst_invoice group by status;
